Posts.Content: On 4/22/2009 dove111 wrote: I was on arimidex for 3 years and after having all kinds of side affects decided quality of life was more important than being sick all the time.  I have gained 45 lbs., and haven't lost anything after three weeks of weight watchers, in fact I gained 3 lbs.  Has anyone else had this issue and has anyone stopped treatment early due to side affects?   cindy     Cindy: I was diagnosed with early stage of breast cancer and was taking Arimidex for about two weeks.  I had to get off the drug due to my bones and muscles aching from the waist down.  Yes, I, too, have experienced weight gain such as 5 pounds within one month.  This is not acceptable to me but quality of life is high on my radar.  I am taking Femara but am experiencing some side effects as well but not like Arimidex.  Good luck.
Posts.Title: Arimidex and side affects
